situation: A few players are playing a boardgame. The current state of the game is as follows. The chinchilla is named Lucy. The dinosaur has a card that is orange in color, is named Luna, and is watching a movie from 1963. And the rules of the game are as follows. Rule1: One of the rules of the game is that if the dinosaur neglects the dragon, then the dragon will, without hesitation, hug the husky. Rule2: Regarding the dinosaur, if it is watching a movie that was released before Zinedine Zidane was born, then we can conclude that it does not neglect the dragon. Rule3: The dinosaur will neglect the dragon if it (the dinosaur) has a name whose first letter is the same as the first letter of the chinchilla's name. Rule3 is preferred over Rule2.
question: Based on the game state and the rules and preferences, does the dragon hug the husky?
label: proved
